name: switchCode
help:
Keeps your Nintendo Switch Friend Code stored for reference and sharing.

*Usage Examples*
`r!switchCode SW-YOUR-CODE-HERE` Sets your Nintendo Switch code (include dashes).
`r!switchCode clear` Your Nintendo Switch code will be removed from the database.
`r!switchCode` Gets sender's Nintendo Switch code.
`r!switchCode @USER` Gets mentioned users' Nintendo Switch code.

name: 3DSCode
help:
Keeps your Nintendo 3DS Friend Code stored for reference and sharing.

*Usage Examples*
`r!3DSCode YOUR-CODE-HERE` Sets your Nintendo 3DS code (include dashes).
`r!3DSCode clear` Your Nintendo 3DS code will be removed from the database.
`r!3DSCode` Gets sender's Nintendo 3DS code.
`r!3DSCode @USER` Gets mentioned users' Nintendo 3DS code.

name: smo
help:
Stores your Balloon World codes (from Super Mario Odyssey) for reference and sharing.

*Usage Examples*
`r!smo KINGDOM YOUR-CODE-HERE` Sets a Balloon World code for the specified kingdom (no dashes or spaces).
`r!smo KINGDOM` Gets sender's Balloon World code for the specified kingdom.

*Kingdoms*
In any examples, replace `KINGDOM` with one of the following:
`cap` `cascade` `sand` `lake` `wooded` `lost` `metro` `snow` `seaside` `luncheon` `bowser` `moon` `mushroom`

name: coin
help: Flips a coin. Can land on heads, tails, or its side.

name: dice
help:
Tosses a six-sided die. Can also be executed with `r!die`. Add a number from 1 to 10 to roll multiple dice.

*Usage Examples*
`r!dice 8` Rolls eight dice.

name: 8ball
help: Ask a yes/no question after this command and recieve an answer from the stars (Reliability of answers may vary).

name: ping
help: Returns the response time, or ping, of a message.

name: build
help: Returns the current build or version.

name: guilds
help: Returns how many guilds (servers) this bot is serving.

name: settings
help:
Lists your current settings

*Usage Examples*
`r!settings switchCode PUBLIC` Sets the sender's privacy settings for their Nintendo Switch friend code.

*Format*
`r!settings [platform]Code [PRIVACY]`

*Arguments*
**platform** - `3DS`, `Switch`
**privacy** - `PUBLIC`, `PRIVATE`

name: invite
help: Sends a link to invite RosalinaBot to another server.

name: vote
help:
Sends a link to vote for RosalinaBot on Discord Bot List. Votes help increase the popularity of RosalinaBot. No account creation required, just sign in with your Discord account!

Note: Simply running this command does not cast a vote. You must use the link.

name: github
help: View the source code, request features, and report bugs.

name: help
help:
Use this command for detailed information on each command.

*Usage Examples*
`r!help 8ball` Returns help documentation for `r!8ball`.
